meta.basedOn: External audit comparing current allowlist against SRD 5.2 specification

race.summary: SRD 5.2 includes 9 species total. Current list has 5, missing 4.
race.notes: Gnome may need to be added if not present. All 9 SRD 5.2 species: Dragonborn, Dwarf, Elf, Gnome, Goliath, Halfling, Human, Orc, Tiefling

background.summary: SRD 5.2 contains exactly 4 backgrounds. Current list has 11.
background.notes: Noble and Outlander are also non-SRD but weren't in the original allowlist

feat.summary: Major overhaul needed. SRD 5.2 has different feat set than 5.1.
feat.notes: Fighting Style feats and Epic Boons are new to SRD 5.2. Ability Score Improvement is a class feature, not a feat in 5.2.

spell.summary: Dozens of corrections needed. Many SRD spells incorrectly blocked.

spellNameAliases.notes: Some spells have name variations between editions

spell.notes: Full spell list resync recommended rather than incremental patching. Current allowlist may have name mismatches.

beast.summary: Many non-SRD beasts in allowlist, missing some SRD ones.
beast.notes: Many beasts in current list are from Monster Manual, not SRD

equipment.notes: Tools and adventuring gear sections may need additional review

class.summary: Missing Monk and Paladin from allowlist.
class.notes: All 12 core classes are in SRD 5.2

subclass.summary: SRD 5.2 contains NO subclass text. All must be removed.
subclass.notes: SRD 5.2 only provides class progression tables, not subclass features. Sample subclasses (Champion, Thief, Life, Evoker) are for reference only.

subclass-spell.summary: All subclass spells should be blocked since subclasses aren't SRD.
subclass-spell.action: Move all current subclass-spell entries from allowlist to blocklist
subclass-spell.notes: Domain spells, expanded spell lists, etc. are subclass features

subclass-cantrip.summary: All subclass cantrips should be blocked since subclasses aren't SRD.
subclass-cantrip.action: Move all current subclass-cantrip entries from allowlist to blocklist
subclass-cantrip.notes: Light Domain's Light cantrip grant, Nature Domain druid cantrip, etc.

racial-base-feature.summary: Only 9 SRD species should have racial base features.
racial-base-feature.notes: Half-Elf and Half-Orc are not in SRD 5.2. Features should use 2024 species rules, not 2014 PHB traits.

racial-feature.summary: Update to SRD 2024 species traits only.
racial-feature.notes: Current features based on 2014 PHB. Need full review against 2024 SRD species traits.

racial-spell.summary: Update to match SRD 5.2 species innate spellcasting.
racial-spell.notes: Tiefling spells may need update for 2024 version. Gnome, Dwarf, Goliath, Orc spell features need review.

steps: 2. For each category, update entity status values in manifest
3. Run npm run generate-srd-allowlist to regenerate js/generated/srd-allowlist.js
4. Run npm run generate-srd-regression-pack to update test pack
5. Manual QA to verify filtering works correctly
6. Update generate-srd-regression-pack.mjs to remove subclass record generation
risks: Users may notice missing content they assumed was SRD
Spell name matching must be exact - aliases may cause mismatches
Subclass removal affects character creation significantly
Some data structures may need updates for new SRD 5.2 categories (Epic Boons, Fighting Styles)
